author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #38177

> This PR provides a minimal fix to a memory leak identified in https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/high-memory-usage-in-promptreco-jobs-for-run-352516/11040/9 .

#### PR validation:

What was described in #38177

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #38177
title: [12_4_X] Fix memory leak in AlCaHcalHBHEMuonProducer
